news.title: Trump rejects pleas from business for more clarity on tariffs: 'They always say that'
news.summary: Trump and his aides warned amid the tariff controversy that Americans could be in store for some temporary economic strain — including higher prices. Trump: "We're going to have to make some tough decisions"

news.title: Here's why banks don’t want the CFPB to disappear
news.summary: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau and its employees are in limbo after acting Director Russell Vought took over last month. The agency is responsible for overseeing the nation's financial system.

news.title: Kugler says Fed should hold interest rates amid inflation risks
news.summary: Inflation could continue to be 'persistent' and prices could potentially increase again, Federal Reserve Governor Adriana Kugler says.

news.title: Novo Nordisk shares fall 6.3% after latest trial results for its next-generation weight loss drug
news.summary: Shares of Novo Nordisk fell sharply on Monday, after the firm published results from the latest clinical trial of its CagriSema weight-loss drug.

news.title: These accounts can be the 'worst possible asset’ for retirement, expert says. Here's why
news.summary: Many investors don't plan for future taxes when contributing to traditional IRAs. Here are the key things to know about how to contribute to a traditional IRA.

news.title: There’s a Fed put and a Trump put — but don’t forget the C-suite put as well
news.summary: Companies may put a floor under stocks by switching to buybacks from capital expenditure, according to Citi strategists. Citi: Companies may switch to buyback from capital Expenditure.

news.title: One of Wall Street’s biggest bulls now says a flash crash can’t be ruled out
news.summary: Ed Yardeni says a bear market for stocks may already be underway. He says a “flash crash’ can’t be ruled out.

news.title: European stocks have crushed the U.S. — now a big bank is shifting its view
news.summary: HSBC strategists are changing their tune on European stocks. The year has started with a big rally for European stocks as the U.S. market struggles to remain above water.

news.title: Nvidia’s stock is cheap by this metric. Can next week’s GTC get it going again?
news.summary: Nvidia hosts its annual conference next week at a time when investors have soured on AI stocks. Nvidia is the world's largest maker of computer graphics chips.

news.title: Redfin’s stock soars on buyout deal by Rocket Cos that looks to speed up home buying
news.summary: Rocket wants to be a one-stop shop for the entire home-buying process. Rocket wants to help you buy your first home.
